document.docAuthor: Lin Zhu, Ting Qin & Hongwei Chen
document.masterDocTitle: Three new species of the subgenus Ashima (Diptera: Drosophildae: Phortica) from southwestern China, with DNA barcoding information

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Three new species of the subgenus Ashima (Diptera: Drosophildae: Phortica) from southwestern China, with DNA barcoding information

subSubSection.paragraph: 1. Arista not expanded apica ll y; a ll tibiae with 2 dark rings; 5th tarsomere of fore l eg without l ong seta apica ll y.............................................................................................................. 2

– Arista expanded apica ll y; a ll tibiae without dark rings; 5th tarsomere of fore l eg with 1 l ong seta apica ll y ( Cao et a l. 2011 , fig. 1D). ............................................................ 4

2. Vertica l process of gonopods narrow l y sc l erotized among margin; aedeaga l median rod not furcated dista ll y, with 2 sma ll projections ( An et a l. 2015 , figs 14, 15).. ...................................................................................
qingsongi An and Chen in An et a l. 2015
– Vertica l process of gonopods sc l erotized dorsa ll y ( Chen et a l. 2005b , figs 3, 4; Cheng et a l. 2008 , fig. 3); aedeaga l median rod furcated or trifo l iated dista ll y. ... 3

3. Vertica l process of gonopods near l y symmetric dorsa ll y ( Chen et a l. 2005b , figs 3, 4); aedeaga l median rod bifurcated dista ll y, with 1 bifurcated sc l erite ( Chen et a l. 2005b , figs 3, 4)................... ..................
afoliolata Chen and Toda in Chen et a l. 2005b

– Vertica l process of gonopods distinct l y asymmetric dorsta ll y ( Cheng et a l. 2008 , fig. 3); aedeaga l median rod trifo l iated dista ll y, with 2 sma ll sc l erites ( Cheng et a l. 2008 , fig. 3)...................... .....................
xishuangbanna Cheng and Chen in Cheng et a l. 2008

6. Vertica l process of gonopods near l y unsc l erotized; aedeaga l median rod apica ll y hooked, somewhat l ike anchor ( Chen et a l. 2005b , fig. 32)................................................. ...........................................................................
tanabei Chen and Toda in Chen et a l. 2005b
– Vertica l process of gonopods near l y entire l y sc l erotized apica ll y; aedeagus l acking sc l erotized median rod, with numerous spinu l es ( Chen et a l. 2005b , fig. 23)........ 7

7. Arista with 1 (most l y) or 2 (occasiona ll y) dorsa l branches, and severa l spinu l es at tip ( An et a l. 2015 , fig. 7)............................... montipagana An and Chen in An et a l. 2015
– Arista with 2 dorsa l branches, and 1 or 3 spinu l es at tip................................................ 8

– Paramere round apica ll y in l atera l view ( Chen et a l. 2005a , fig. 4C); arista tip with 3 sma ll processes media ll y and l atera ll y ( Chen et a l. 2005a , fig. 4A)................................... ........................................................................
longipenis Chen and Gao in Chen et a l. 2005a

9. Arista tip deep l y bifurcated apica ll y ( Cheng et a l. 2008 , fig. 4); aedeaga l median rod broken submedia ll y, aedeaga l median rod broken submedia ll y, and separated into 2 apica ll y pointed sc l erites; aedeaga l outer membrane with spinu l es ( Cheng et a l. 2008 , fig. 7).................................................
huiluoi Cheng and Chen in Cheng et a l. 2008

– Arista tip unbifurcated apica ll y; aedeaga l median rod desc l erotized, l acking sc l er- ites; aedeaga l outer membrane without spinu l es............................................................. 10

10. Vertica l process of gonopods comp l ete l y symmetrica l ( Chen et a l. 2005b , fig. 27).. .....................................................................
symmetria Chen and Toda in Chen et a l. 2005b

13. Arista micropubescent ventra ll y ( Cheng et a l. 2008 , fig. 19); expanded tip 3 times as wide as base ( Cheng et a l. 2008 , fig. 19).....................
speculum ( Máca and Lin 1993 )

– Arista l acking micropubescence ventra ll y ( Cheng et a l. 2008 , fig. 14); expanded tip as wide as base ( Cheng et a l. 2008 , fig. 14)................................................................................ .................................................................. pavriarista Cheng and Chen in Cheng et a l. 2008

14. Gonopods pointed and recurved apicomedia ll y ( Chen et a l. 2005b , fig. 8)................. ...............................................................
brachychaeta Chen and Toda in Chen et a l. 2005b

16. Arista l tip broadened, the width is 2/3 of the l ength ( Chen et a l. 2005a , fig. 3A); paramere strong l y curved dista ll y ( Chen et a l. 2005a , fig. 3D)........................................... ....................................................................
saltiaristula Chen and Wen in Chen et a l. 2005a
– Arista l tip narrow, navicu l ar; paramere s l ight l y curved dista ll y................................... 17

17. Both l atera l l obes of the vertica l process of gonopods pointed and curved, the anterior projection on right side not bifurcated ( An et a l. 2015 , fig. 5)......................... ............................................................................................
haba An and Chen in An et a l. 2015

– Latera l l obes of vertica l process of gonopods not pointed, the anterior projection on right side bifurcated. ............................................................................................................... 18

– One of the two anterior projections on the right l atera l l obe of gonopods not serrated ( Chen et a l. 2005a , fig. 2C)................................................................................................ .................................................................
sagittaristula Chen and Wen in Chen et a l. 2005a
19. Left l atera l l obe of vertica l process of gonopods l acking projection ( Figure 2 (d)). 20

20. Two l atera l l obes of vertica l process of gonopods near l y equa l in size ( Tsacas and Okada 1983, fig. 4 )............................................ ...........................................
foliiseta Duda 1923

– Left l atera l l obe of vertica l process of gonopods more e l ongated than the right ( Figure 2 (d))...........................................................................................................
yalianae
sp. nov.

21. Arista most l y with 2 dorsa l branches subbasa ll y ( Figure 1 (a)); vertica l process of gonopods submedia ll y with 1 rod- l ike process on l eft side ( Figure 1 (d), pr l), and 1 near l y triangu l ar process on right side ( Figure 1 (d, e), pr r).....................
libo
sp. nov.

– Arista with 3 distinct dorsa l branches basa ll y ( Figure 3 (a)); vertica l process of the l eft side of gonopods bifurcated posterior l y, l acking process on right side ( Figure 3 (d), pr l)............................................................. ............................................................
yiqini
sp. nov.
